I am a Junior at the University of California Irvine, studying Computer Science - Games.

I spend most of my time outside of school learning real world skills, including:

  • - Pair Programming
  • - Software Engineering
  • - Team Building / Team Management - Producer Skills
  • - Test Driven Development
  • - Clean Coding Techniques
  • - Scripting Languages


	C++ and Java are my primary programming languages.
	Lua is my favorite scripting language.
	I also know Python, JSP, and SQL.
	I have written inline x86 assembly in C code.
